thread.title: Marchand back on the ice | Bruins Insider |
thread.title_full: Marchand back on the ice | Bruins Insider | | Boston Herald

author: Stephen Harris
title: Marchand back on the ice | Bruins Insider |
text:
WILMINGTON -- A happy sight for the winless Bruins at practice today: Winger Brad Marchand, who suffered a concussion Saturday against Montreal, is back on the ice. Marchand is wearing a green, non-contact jersey, but just the fact that he's okay to skate means his concussion is probably of the very minor variety. Generally, players with such injuries are held out of action for only about a week.
The Bruis fly this afternoon to Denver, where they face the Colorado Avalanche tomorrow night. The Avs are 1-1-0, but have already scored 10 goals. The B's then face the Phoenix Coyotes in Glendale Saturday.
